uiw.utility - MATLAB File Help
uiw.utility
Contents of uiw.utility package:

     copyDataToWorkspace - copy the input data to a workspace variable
         createThumbnail - Creates a thumbnail image for an image file
     getRelativeFilePath - Utility to return a relative file path within a root
          interpretColor - Utility to interpret a color as an RGB triple
                java2mat - Utility to convert Java array to MATLAB array
                loadIcon - Utility to load an icon file
                mat2java - Utility to convert MATLAB array to Java array
      moveFigureOnScreen - Ensures that a figure is fully on screen
openDocumentationSection - Open documentation
            positionOver - Reposition figure centered over another figure
     setPropsIfDifferent - Utility to set graphics properties after only if changed
         table2clipboard - place a table on the clipboard for pasting into Excel
                tf2onoff - Utility to convert logical true/false to char 'on'/'off'
           validateColor - validates a color string or [r,g,b] input
       validateIndicesOf - validate indices into an array
